## Antifungal timeline

<br>

```{r}
library(readxl)
timeline <- read_excel("timeline.xlsx", col_types = c("text", "date", "text", "text", "text", "text"))
library (vistime)
vistime (timeline, 
         col.event = "event",
         col.start = "start",
         col.group = "group",
         col.color = "color",
         col.fontcolor = "fontcolor",
         col.tooltip = "tooltip",
         optimize_y = TRUE,
         linewidth = NULL,
         title = NULL,
         show_labels = TRUE,
         background_lines = NULL)
```
